```
Usage: vcd cluster create [OPTIONS] <name>

Options:
  -N, --nodes <nodes>             Number of nodes to create
  -c, --cpu <cpu-count>           Number of virtual cpus on each node
  -m, --memory <memory>           Amount of memory (in MB) on each node
  -n, --network <network>         Network name
  -s, --storage-profile <storage-profile>
                                  Name of the storage profile for the nodes
  -k, --ssh-key <ssh-key>         SSH key to talk to the guest os on the vm
  -h, --help                      Show this message and exit.

```
